Issue.creator: skarim
Issue.summary: Test scripts 'passwordsInLog_test.sh' not in correct location
Issue.description: The test script 'passwordsInLog_test.sh' is currently located in 'fabric_ca/passwordsInLog_test.sh', which is not the appropriate location. The correct location for this fvt test is in the 'fabric_ca/scripts/' folder for this test case to get executed.
